1673000.name: Blood Field | Cỏ Máu
1673000.description:
Storyline:
Blood Field is a horror game set in the rural areas of Vietnam in the past, when a mindset that valued men over women still heavily burdened women. The game puts players in the role of the character Minh, who is confronted with the unjust death of his older sister and the sudden death of his brother-in-law. Minh has to face supernatural phenomenons and uncover the reasons behind the deaths of his siblings. Dark truths are gradually revealed...

Gameplay:
Blood Field is a first-person horror game that combines survival elements with puzzle-solving gameplay

Development Team:
TEGA Studio is an indie game studio established in 2020, VietNam, with 4 members. Horror game “Blood Field” is TEGA ‘s first product. The studio aims to create products that show the cultural identity of Vietnam and convey meaningful messages through gameplay and storyline to gamers.
1673000.supported_languages:
英语, 越南语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
